title: Never give up
creator_credit: Haris Fazlic, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
brief_description: Haris Fazlic got sick of being larger than his classmates and took up exercising and, eventually, discovered his passion for wrestling. This passion has driven him to win many times despite having to overcome a major obstacle on the way. Wrestling has taught Haris that you should never give up on something you love, no matter what.
creator_credit_for_label: Haris Fazlic, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
